name: OpenSky Finance
introduce: OpenSky Finance is an integrated peer-to-pool and peer-to-peer NFT lending protocol built on top of Aave. OpenSky is the first mover on Time-based liquidation which means no auto liquidation risk for borrowers. OpenSky will pass lender deposits directly to aave.com’s battle-tested money markets, which means solving the ‘wasted deposits’ problem common in DeFi lending.
